summary: This document is an email correspondence from Paul Morris to Jeffrey Epstein, suggesting a meeting on January 16, 2013. The email indicates a specific time and location for the proposed meeting.

keyFacts: Paul Morris contacted Jeffrey Epstein to schedule a meeting.
The proposed meeting date is January 16, 2013, at 4:30 PM.
The meeting location is specified as 9 East 71st street between 5th and Madison.
